name: Ext_R5_AppointmentResponse_participantStatus
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.AppointmentResponse.participantStatus for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents AppointmentResponse.participantStatus from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AppointmentResponse|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: Participation status of the participant. When the status is declined or tentative if the start/end times are different to the appointment, then these times should be interpreted as a requested time change. When the status is accepted, the times can either be the time of the appointment (as a confirmation of the time) or can be empty.
element.comment: `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus` maps to R4 `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labelled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.definition: Participation status of the participant. When the status is declined or tentative if the start/end times are different to the appointment, then these times should be interpreted as a requested time change. When the status is accepted, the times can either be the time of the appointment (as a confirmation of the time) or can be empty.
element.comment: `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus` maps to R4 `AppointmentResponse.participantStatus`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: The Participation status of an appointment.
